title: Morning Breadfast
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>*Munch munch*…. Ah, Dia-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Good morning, Hanamaru-san. You’re early<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Good morning. Maru thought that no one would come here so Maru started eating…. Uu, sorry<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>My, I think it’s better than skipping breakfast altogether<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru will finish it quickly! *Munch munch munch*<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Y-, you don’t have to rush it that much….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>*Gulp*.... Thanks for the meal!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>? Hanamaru-san, there are some left on the side of your mouth…. There, I got it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hawawa! That’s so embarrassing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, then I won’t tell anyone, okay♪ It’s a secret between us<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
